channel.title: Blogs on Lex Romo
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Lex Romo

item.title: My Phishing Text Experience
item.description: Hey everyone, do yourself a favour: go and get your self some popcorn because I have for you today a Halloween tale from the digital world. Today, I want to share a recent experience that left me both startled and enlightened about the dangers lurking in the depths of our mobile devices: a job offer text phishing scam. YES!! you did hear that right! sit down and enjoy :).

item.title: Cybersecurity and your digital print on the internet.
item.description: Insights from the Podcast: “Teen Crypto Swappers: The Dark Web’s Rising Stars”: Hey everyone, I stumbled upon this fascinating podcast titled “These Teen Crypto Swappers Can Make $100,000 in 10 Mins - If They Don’t Get CaughtðŸŽ™Ep 112 Dirty Coms” by Jack Rhysider, and let me tell you, it’s a real eye-opener. Podcast summary: So, in this podcast, we get to hear from a guy they call “Drew,” although that’s not his real name.

item.title: Cybersecurity Frameworks
item.description: Hello, cybersecurity enthusiasts and professionals! Today, Iâ€™m excited to share something essential that we all need to understand in our fieldâ€”the importance of cybersecurity frameworks. Letâ€™s explore this critical topic together on my blog. What is a cybersecurity framework? Cybersecurity frameworks provide structured guidelines for protecting sensitive data, securing systems, and managing risk. They serve as roadmaps for organizations to follow, ensuring they adhere to best practices, legal requirements, and industry standards.
